attributes.action: Stop petrol stations from the same company having different prices.
attributes.background: Sainsbury's, Asda, Tesco etc, Shouldn't be allowed to offer different prices for fuel at different stations that are only a couple of miles apart. If Sainsburys are to charge 119.9 this should be flat rate across all stores

rejection.details: The cost of fuel at different stations is a commercial decision for individual stations and retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
